english.segment1: I don't really know how long forever is. But that's how long I'm gonna give my life. Everything I face that tries to tear me down. No I won't back away from the sacrifice
english.segment2: I won't forget what your love means to me. You're always there to light my way
english.segment3: Chorus: When all the lights go down and the world is quiet, no one is around. I wanna be the same man that I served you then like I serve you now. Let my convictions never change. Oh let my knee for you remain. As real as the moment I was saved. So I will always stand amazed
english.segment4: Sometimes my heart desires such selfish things. When the moment comes help me to trust. Something better that you have for me. If I could just hold on to you enough. I won't forget what your love means to me. You're always there to light my way
english.segment6: You will be my strength when I am weak. When I wanna give in and not turn the other cheek. Oh let this be the prayer that I speak. That I speak
